divs: sighting detailsa friend of mine went with his friends on snow mobiling for the day, some time in march 2008. they had stopped for a short break when they had seen helicopters flying all around them. my friend had taken photos of the helicopters. just a week ago, my friend was showing me the photos. i enlarged one of the pictures to get a closer look at the helicopter, when i noticed, at the top of the page, was a purple\blue disk shaped object. i do not know if the digital camera had a spot on the lens or it was just a reflection. there were several other photos showing the same object but in different areas of the pictures. i asked my friend if he or anyone else had seen the object but no one had. that's why i was wondering if it was just a spot on the lens. i don't think it was a trick. what puzzles me is that no one had seen these objects they had only seen the hellicoptors. i feel a little silly writing about this but i can't help wondering, what if? the following attached pics are just a few of many. thank you...
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Pittsfield
There were no other sightings in Pittsfield on or around March 26th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
